footer.DESCRIPTION: The best directory website template for showcasing your projects, tools, and resources with style and functionality.
footer.DISCLAIMER: All product names, logos, and brands are the property of their respective owners. All company, product, and service names used in this repository, related repositories, and associated websites are for identification purposes only. The use of these names, logos, and brands does not imply endorsement, affiliation, or sponsorship. This directory may include content generated by artificial intelligence (AI)
footer.NEWSLETTER_DESCRIPTION: Get the latest updates and exclusive content delivered to your inbox.
footer.BUILDING_FUTURE: Building the future of digital experiences with innovative solutions and exceptional design.

newsletter.SUBSCRIBE_TEXT: Subscribe to our newsletter for the latest news and updates
newsletter.SUCCESS_MESSAGE: Thank you for subscribing to our newsletter!
newsletter.ERROR_MESSAGE: An error occurred. Please try again later.

DETAILS_FORM.TITLE: Tell Us About Your Product
DETAILS_FORM.DESCRIPTION: Share the details that will help users discover and understand your amazing product
DETAILS_FORM.CATEGORY_PLACEHOLDER: Select a category for your product
DETAILS_FORM.TAGS_DESCRIPTION: Select relevant tags to help users find your product
DETAILS_FORM.SHORT_DESCRIPTION_PLACEHOLDER: A compelling description that captures what makes your product special (max 150 characters)
DETAILS_FORM.DETAILED_INTRODUCTION_PLACEHOLDER: Tell the full story of your product. What problem does it solve? What makes it unique? How does it help users?
DETAILS_FORM.MARKDOWN_SUPPORT: Markdown formatting supported for rich text styling

PAYMENT.TITLE: Complete Your Order
PAYMENT.DESCRIPTION: Secure checkout with enterprise-grade encryption and fraud protection
PAYMENT.PAYMENT_FEE_DESCRIPTION: To list your product in our directory, there is a one-time fee of {price}. This helps us maintain the quality of listings and support the platform.
PAYMENT.SECURITY_DESCRIPTION: Your payment is protected by 256-bit SSL encryption, PCI DSS Level 1 compliance, and processed securely through Stripe.
PAYMENT.GLOBAL_DESC: Trusted by millions of businesses worldwide

REVIEW.TITLE: Review Your Submission
REVIEW.DESCRIPTION: Everything looks great! Review your details and submit your product to our directory
REVIEW.REVIEW_DESCRIPTION: Your listing will be reviewed by our team within 1-2 business days
REVIEW.INSTANT_DESCRIPTION: Your listing will be published immediately after submission

VALIDATION.INVALID_EMAIL: Please enter a valid email address

SUCCESS.REVIEW_PROCESS: Our team will review your submission

pricing.DESCRIPTION: From free exploration to premium features, find the perfect plan that matches your ambitions and grows with your success.
pricing.READY_TO_GET_STARTED: Ready to get started with your listing?
pricing.PAY_ONLY_WHAT_YOU_USE: Pay only for what you use
